fr_BE {
    LocaleID { "080c" }
    LocaleString { "fr_BE" }
    NumberElements { 
            ",",
            ".",
            ";",
            "%",
            "0",
            "#",
            "-",
            "E",
            "\u2030",
            "\u221E",
            "\uFFFD",
    }
    ShortCountry { "BEL" }
    localPatternChars { "GanjkHmsSEDFwWxhKzZ" }
    calendar{
        gregorian{
            DateTimePatterns{
                    "H' h 'mm' min 'ss' s 'z",
                    "H:mm:ss z",
                    "H:mm:ss",
                    "H:mm",
                    "EEEE d MMMM yyyy",
                    "d MMMM yyyy",
                    "dd-MMM-yyyy",
                    "d/MM/yy",
                    "{1} {0}",
            }
        }
    }
}
